review: He never charges any extra money. I submitted only hospital fees and doctor fees at Neotia Newtown . Everything I submitted in the hospital only. On the other hand, in the year 2021 for my elder daughter delivery   I was under other doctor at Parkstreet neotia He took from me almost 1 lakh separate then sudden  2 days before admission for delivery, they checked and I was covid  positive. As He delivered under covid situation he charged again 1lakh and 20k for covid prevention like  gloves during operation.  These money I didn't paid in the hospital. These all I gave separate to him. Thankfully, in my second issue I changed my doctor to Mahapatra sir and I was really saved. He is so nice doctor and he had saved me! I recommend everyone. He is the best doctor. Surely you will be cured and he never charged any extra money. Even within 15days if you go for checkup after last checkup, he don't charge any fees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had a wonderful experience with SDM Sir.
To be precise , I had a very complicated pregnancy.
I was under another doctor initially . My reports were not that great and I was told to proceed with termination. I came across SDM Sir and then he guided me with several advance tests which led to confirmation of my pregnancy by 6th month.
His calm and poised nature along with immense patience toward his patients is really commendable. Always available over phone and WhatsApp for any queries during my pregnancy .
I can‚Äôt thank him enough for my delivery of my baby boy.
He is next to God. Highly skilled , super experienced and one of the top senior gynaecologist !!!

Highly highly recommend..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's been a fantastic experience under supervision of Doctor Sankar Dasmahapatra. He is very approachable n highly responsive over wats app which helped a lot during the critical period. Thank you Sir for making the pregnancy journey for US, a memorable one.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was a patient of ectopic pregnancy. The rest of the doctors were unable to find out what to do in my case before meeting Sir. Mahapatra Sir immediately told me that the situation was serious and I should be admitted to hospital. Nobody knew that my tube was ruptured and it could not be detected even in the test, but I got the benefit of Mahapatra Sir's experience. He decided to undergo my surgery only on the basis of his experience. Surgery was necessary because the tube had actually ruptured. Now I am fine because of sir.  This is not a review given in pressure, but I will recommend to everyone that they should consult Mahapatra sir once in such a problem.
i have strongly recommended for the Mr.mahapatra sir.he will suggest  which is better for patients.my wife is having uterus fibroid,it's operated by Mr.& mrs.mahapatra sir within 2 hrs successfully.

*** ** *** **** *********** ******** you can totally rely on him. A very polite person,he will give you complete care till recovery. I was a patient of his,undergone a mymectomy surgery  of 20 cm fibroid removal & after 3 days of my surgery i was able to walk and do all my stuffs smoothly with out any pain. I think this is all we want ,a painless surgery & a quick recovery. Thank you,hope my experience will be helpfull for you.
